headline: Globe Life (GL): Reassessing Valuation After a 23% Year-to-Date Share Price Gain
summary: Globe Life (GL) has quietly built a strong track record, and its recent share performance is making some investors revisit the story. The stock is up over 20% this year, outpacing many insurers. See our latest analysis for Globe Life. That move sits on top of a solid backdrop, with a year to date share price return of 23.4 percent and a 1 year total shareholder return of 27.7 percent, suggesting momentum is still tilting in Globe Life’s favor despite a recent soft patch. If Globe Life’s run...
